pkgmetadata.longdescription: Noncompartmental Analysis of Pharmacokinetics // Conduct noncompartmental analysis as close as possible to the most widely used commercial pharmacokinetic analysis software, i.e. 'Phoenix(R) WinNonlin(R)' https://www.certara.com/software /pkpd-modeling-and-simulation/phoenix-winnonlin/. For more details on noncompartmental analysis, see the reference: Rowland M, Tozer TN. Clinical Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics - Concepts and Applications. 4e. 2011.
